y.layout.hierarchic
Class LinearSegmentsDrawer

java.lang.Object
  y.layout.hierarchic.AbstractDrawer
      y.layout.hierarchic.LinearSegmentsDrawer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawer
public class LinearSegmentsDrawer
extends AbstractDrawer

This class implements the third phase of the Sugiyama layout algorithm. Edges are represented as poly-lines with at most two bends.
